Text: Free Web Seminar Learn About the Benefits of Rules TechnologyHello Youre invited to attend a free minute web seminar on Wednesday October th at am PDT pm EDT Attend this seminar to learn how rules management technology can help you streamline business processes and significantly reduce operations costs To register for this seminar click here neweventswebseminarwebinarhphtml Blaze Advisor from HNC will be presenting Revolutionizing Application Development with Rules Management Technology This seminar will provide you with a business level overview of Blaze Advisor the most advanced rules management software available and will explain how you can significantly improve business processes and applications using rules management technology With Blaze Advisor you can Automate high volume complex processes and transactions Reuse business policies and enterprise data across all systems Update rules and data while in production with no down time Empower nontechnical business managers by enabling them to control rule driven processes James Taylor Director of Product Marketing for Blaze Advisor will be presenting Revolutionizing Application Development with Rules Management Technology and will explain how business rules work and how they can dramatically improve the way you design develop and maintain business applications To see a list of other upcoming Blaze Advisor web seminars click here neweventsupcomingeventshtml If you do not wish to receive this information in the future and would like to be removed from this mailing list please reply to this message with REMOVE in the subject line Thank you
